content: is there such a thing as  Chrome extension: add instapaper button to feedly?

Yes, there is a Chrome extension called "InstaFeed" that allows you to add an Instapaper button to Feedly. This extension integrates Instapaper functionality directly into Feedly, making it easier to save articles and content for reading later. You can find this extension in the Chrome Web Store by searching for "InstaFeed" or by visiting the following link: [InstaFeed Chrome Extension](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/instafeed-add-instapaper/bdhjgmpddnldhegehbjgknailkokkeli)
